member.name: NMLVGETINFOTIPA
member.summary: Contains and receives list-view item information needed to display a tooltip for an item. This structure is used with the LVN_GETINFOTIP notification code.

member.name: NMLVGETINFOTIPA.hdr
member.summary: structure that contains information on this notification code.

member.name: NMLVGETINFOTIPA.dwFlags
member.summary: Either zero or LVGIT_UNFOLDED. See Remarks.

member.name: NMLVGETINFOTIPA.pszText
member.summary: Address of a string buffer that receives any additional text information. IfdwFlags is zero, this member will contain the existing item text. In this case, you should append any additional text onto the end of this string. The size of this buffer is specified by thecchTextMax structure.

member.name: NMLVGETINFOTIPA.cchTextMax
member.summary: Size, in characters, of the buffer pointed to bypszText. Although you should never assume that this buffer will be of any particular size, the INFOTIPSIZE value can be used for design purposes.

member.name: NMLVGETINFOTIPA.iItem
member.summary: Zero-based index of the item to which this structure refers.

member.name: NMLVGETINFOTIPA.iSubItem
member.summary: One-based index of the subitem to which this structure refers. If this member is zero, the structure is referring to the item and not a subitem. This member is not currently used and will always be zero.

member.name: NMLVGETINFOTIPA.lParam
member.summary: Application-defined value associated with the item. This member is not currently used and will always be zero.
